backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing access‑controlled user profiles, game stats, and in‑progress run storage with admin and per‑user permissions.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing touch‑controls related tasks, affected files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collection of short summaries describing purpose and behavior of major frontend files.
frontend/docs/IMPLEMENTATION_GUIDE.md: High‑level implementation guide outlining project structure and tech overview for the Space Shooter game.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base config and OKLCH variable definitions for theming, including dark mode values and global styling.
frontend/index.html: Bare HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root app component handling game state transitions, stats loading/saving, in‑progress run restoration, and theme setup.
frontend/src/components/AppErrorBoundary: React error boundary that logs errors and shows a recovery UI with reload option.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Authentication button managing Internet Identity login/logout with visual states and query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/RotateDeviceOver: Full‑screen overlay prompting users to rotate to landscape mode when required.
frontend/src/game/controls/Joystick.tsx: Implements a touch joystick that tracks pointer movement, normalizes output, and resets on lifecycle events.
frontend/src/game/controls/ShootButton.t: Provides a touch-based shoot button using pointer events and lifecycle resets to signal shooting state.
frontend/src/game/controls/useCombinedCo: Merges keyboard, joystick, and touch shooting into a single control state using magnitude comparison and deadzone logic.
frontend/src/game/controls/useKeyboardCo: Tracks WASD/arrow/space key states and outputs movement and shooting values.
frontend/src/game/persistence/inProgress: Saves, loads, validates, and clears in-progress run data in localStorage with versioning.
frontend/src/game/persistence/useInProgr: Syncs in-progress run data between localStorage and backend via React Query with save/load helpers.
frontend/src/game/persistence/useSavedSt: Loads and saves persistent player stats through the backend using React Query.
Renders a vector-based player ship with gradients, glow effects, and engine light on a canvas.
frontend/src/game/render/GameCanvas.tsx: Renders the game state to a canvas, handling resizing and drawing borders, player, bullets, and enemies.
frontend/src/game/types.ts: Defines core game types for players, bullets, enemies, effects, controls, and game state.
frontend/src/game/ui/Hud.tsx: Implements the main HUD, showing score, timer, phase, level, and a pause dialog.
frontend/src/game/ui/TouchControlsDebugO: Displays a diagnostic overlay showing touch capability, state flags, and visibility metrics for touch controls.
Shows temporary hints for using touch controls, auto-hiding after a few seconds.
frontend/src/game/ui/useTouchControlsDom: Hook measuring joystick and shoot button DOM elements and logging visibility or sizing issues.
frontend/src/game/useGameEngine.ts: Main game engine hook handling state, level logic, timing, spawning, collisions, and effects.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to user identity, refetching dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useDynamicViewport.ts: Tracks visualViewport changes and updates a CSS variable for dynamic viewport height on mobile devices.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and hooks for managing Internet Identity login, stored identities, and authentication state.
frontend/src/hooks/useIsTouchCapable.ts: Determines whether the device supports touch input using multiple capability signals and event listeners.
frontend/src/hooks/useLandscapeOrientati: Tracks mobile orientation state and exposes helpers to lock or unlock screen orientation to landscape.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder file exporting nothing for future query hooks.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and extensive CSS variables for a neon theme, including colors and touch control sizes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering App.
frontend/src/screens/GameScreen.tsx: Implements the main game screen, wiring controls, orientation handling, game engine state, and touch UI elements.
frontend/src/screens/MenuScreen.tsx: Renders the game's main menu with branding, high score display, and options to start or continue a game.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters (including hash routing), handle boolean params, and persist or clear values via sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS with extended colors, shadows, animations, and plugins for typography and animations.
project_state.json: Defines project metadata and known issues, including tasks related to fixing invisible touch controls in production.
